descriptions.description: Reveal all wards in an 800 unit radius for 15 seconds. Max stacks: 1
Place an invisible ward at target location that revealse nearby Visible and Camouflagued enemy targets, lasts for 2 and a half minutes. Max stacks: 2
Regenerates 6 health and 3 mana per second for 16 seconds, restoring a total of 90 health and 45 mana.
Regenerates 10 health per second for 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
Restores 6 mana per second for 15 seconds, restoring a total of 90 mana.
Deal additional damage to monsters and if melee, heal based on the damage dealt. Basic attacks against monsters regenerate mana on-hit and execute large monsters under 300 (+50 per level) health.
Gain additional XP for each large monster kill as well as additional XP for your first large monster kill.
Receive less gold from lane minion kills. This effect disables after 15 minutes. Hunt is consumed after killing 30 monsters, removing the item, but granting the passives permanently.
Restores 12 health per second for 12 seconds, restoring a total of 120 health. Holds 2 charges that refill upon visiting the base.

Dealing damage to an enemy hero/monster with an ability restores 10 Health (Once per ability), killing an enemy target restores 5 Health. After restoring 300 Health, Allows the purchase of a "Legendary" Item.
Deal 15 extra basic damage to minions
Dash forward and deal (+100% Bonus Physical Power)(100% of Sow) physical damage to all nearby enemy heroes and slow them by 80% for 1 seconds - 90s CD.
Store 20% of damage dealt to enemy heroes (109% for AOE abilities) in the past 3 seconds as Sow.
Deal 15 extra basic damage to minions.
Gain 15% bonus movement speed decaying over 5s. During this time your next 3 basic attacks or damaging abilities will deal bonus true damage and reduce current basic ability cooldowns by 2s - 90s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero/Jungle Minion with an ability restores 5 health (Once per ability), killing an Enemy Target restores 10 health. After restoring 300 health, evolve into Assassin Crest.
Deal 15 extra basic damage to Minions.

Cleanse all Negative Debuffs, your next basic attack or damaging ability within 8s will deal bonus true damage based on the target's maximum health, increased by each negative effect removed and heal you equal to the damage dealt - 120s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
Basic attacks deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum health as magic damage and heal for 50% of the damage dealt for 6s - 90s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
Gain a large shield and 10% lifesteal for 5s - 120s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
Successful basic attacks restore 1 health, killing a unit restores 10 health. After restoring 400 health, evolve into Sharpshooter Crest.
Deal 15 extra basic damage to Minions.
Dash forward and gain attack speed for 6s, killing an Enemy Hero within the duration resets the cooldown - 150s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
Successful basic attacks restore 1 health, killing a unit restores 10 health. After restoring 400 health, allows the purchase of a Legendary Item.
Cleans all Negative Debuffs, then gain additional tenacity and attack speed for 8s. Successful basic attacks extend this duration by 0.5s on-hit - 120s CD
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero/Jungle Minion or killing an Enemy Target restores 2.5% maximum health over 15s. After restoring 400 health, allows the purchase of a "Legendary" Item.
Deal 15 extra basic damage to Minions.
Mark your current location. For the next 6s, upon taking lethal damage, resurrect at the target location and restore 40% maximum health and mana - 210s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
Create a dueling zone around you in a large area that remains for 15s. Enemy units within are slowed by 15% and you gain increased damage and movement speed whilst inside - 30s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero/Jungle Minion or killing an Enemy Target restores 2.5% maximum health over 15s. After restoring 400 health, evolve into Champion Crest.
Deal 15 extra basic damage to Minions.
Enter Stasis for 2.5s, rendering yourself invulnerable for the duration but unable to perform actions - 120s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero/Jungle Minion with an ability restores 5 mana (Once per ability), killing an Enemy Target restores 10 mana. After restoring 400 mana, evolve into Wizard Crest.
Deal 15 extra basic damage to Minions.
Enhance your next basic attack to deal additional magic damage, increased by the amount of Souls you have gathered. If this kills the target or they die within 4s, gain an additional Soul - 30s CD.
When you achieve a takedown, gain a Soul that permanently grants you 3 Magical Power.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero/Jungle Minion with an ability restores 5 health (Once per ability), killing an Enemy Target restores 10 health. After restoring 400 health, evolve into Warlock Crest.
Deal 15 extra basic damage to Minions.
Shield yourself based on your maximum mana for 4s, while shielded you are immune to CC - 120s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.

Overcharge for 8s causing lightning to zap up to 3 nearby Enemy Heroes every second dealing magical damage and healing you equal to the damage dealt. Multiple strikes can hit the same target dealing 50% damage per each strike beyond the first - 90s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
Mark your current location. After 4s, teleport back to the marked location and reset your basic ability cooldowns - 60s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
When at maximum stacks of Typhoon, dash in current movement direction and reduce your current basic ability cooldowns by 3s - 30s CD.
Basic attacks grant a stack of Typhoon for 3s, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack grants additional attack speed.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.

Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero/Jungle Minion with an ability restores 5 health (Once per ability), killing an Enemy Target restores 10 health. After restoring 400 health, allows the purchase of a "Legendary" Item.
Deal 15 extra basic damage to Minions.

Dealing a damage to an Enemy Hero/Jungle Minion with an ability restores 5 mana (Once per ability), killing an Enemy Target restores 10 mana. After restoring 400 mana, allows the purchase of a "Legendary" Item.
Deal 15 extra basic damage to Minions.
Redirect 35% of all damage dealt to nearby Allied Heroes to yourself and reduce it by 80% for 8s. This effect disables if you fall below 15% maximum health - 120s CD.
Increase Passive Gold Income by 50% and receive diminishing gold from excessive Minion kills.
Increase Ward Cap from 2 to 3.

Grants a charge every 30s, up to 3 charges. Your next basic attack or damaging ability against an Enemy Hero, Minion or Structure will deal 10 additional magical damage and grant you 40 gold. Does not accur if no Allied Hero is within 3000 units. After granting 400 gold, evolves into Keeper Crest.
Receive diminishing gold from excessive Minion kills.

Grants a charge every 30s, up to 3 charges. Your next basic attack or damaging ability against an Enemy Hero, Minion or Structure will restore 20 health and grant you 40 gold. Does not occur if no Allied Hero is within 3000 units. After granting 400 gold, evolves into Warden Crest.
Receive diminishing gold from excessive Minion kills.

Grants a charge every 30s, up to 3 charges. Your next basic attack or damaging ability against an Enemy Hero, Minion or Structure will deal 15 additional magical damage and grant you 40 gold. Does not occur if no Allied Hero is within 3000 units. After granting 400 gold, allows the purchase of a "Legendary" Item.
Receive diminishing gold from excessive Minion kills.
Target a nearby Enemy Hero, slowing and reducing their attack speed by for 2.5s - 90s CD.
Increase Passive Gold income by 50% and receive diminishing gold from excessive Minion kills.
Increase Ward Cap from 2 to 3.
Dash forward a short distance and pull all nearby Enemy Heroes towards you. Enemy Heroes pulled take increased damage for 3s - 120s CD.
Increase Passive Gold Income by 50% and receive diminishing gold from excessive Minion kills.
Increase Ward Cap from 2 to 3.
Grants nearby Allied Heroes a large shield for 3s. Whilst the shield holds, Heroes gain tenacity - 120s CD.
Increase Passive Gold Income by 50% and receive diminishing gold from excessive Minion kills.
Increase Ward Cap from 2 to 3.
Silences a target within 700 units for 1.5s, if this interrupts an ability, they additionally take magical damage - 90s CD.
Increase Passive Gold Income by 50% and receive diminishing gold from excessive Minion kills.
Increase Ward Cap from 2 to 3.

Designate an Allied Hero as a Companion, if your Companion is nearby and takes damage greater than 8% of their maximum health, they gain a large shield and you both deal increased damage for 5s. If either you or your Companion die, the other receives a 10% movement speed boost for 5s - 15s CD.
Increase Passive Gold Income by 50% and receive diminishing gold from excessive Minion kills.
Increase Ward Cap from 2 to 3.

Grants a charge every 30s, up to 3 charges. Your next basic attack or damaging ability against an Enemy Hero, Minion or Structure will restore 30 health and grant you 40 gold. Does not occur if no Allied Hero is within 3000 units. After granting 400 gold, allows the purchase of a "Legendary" Item.
Receive diminishing gold from excessive Minion kills.
After taking damage, heal 15 (+1% of maximum health) over 15s. This healing is doubled for 5s after killing an Enemy Target. After restoring 400 health, allows the purchase of a "Legendary" Item.
Deal 15 extra basic damage to Minions.
Gain 20% movement speed and gain stacks of Resilience equal to damage taken for 5s. After the duration, restore health equal to 60% of Resilience over 3s - 120s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
For 3s, reflect 60% of the damage dealt to you back to the source - 90s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
Take 0.8% less damage and deal 0.4% less damage per 1% missing health for 8s - 90s CD.
Deal 30 extra basic damage to Minions.
After taking damage, heal 15 (+1% of maximum health) over 15s. This healing is doubled for 5s after killing an Enemy Target. After restoring 400 health, evolves into Goliath Crest.
Deal 15 extra basic damage to Minions.
Stealth Wards last 30s longer.
After using an ability, your next 2 basic attacks within 6s deal bonus physical damage - 3s CD.
Grant 50 magical power and 5 mana regeneration for 5 minutes. Level 11 required for purchase. Effect is lost upon death.
Grant 20 physical armor, 20 magical armor and 15 tenacity for 5 minutes. Level 11 required for purchase. Effect is lost upon death.
Grant 300 health and 20% increased healing for 5 minutes. Level 11 required for purchase. Effect is lost upon death.
Grant 30 physical power and 10% omnivamp for 5 minutes. Level 11 required for purchase. Effect is lost upon death.
When hit by a basic attack, reduce the source's attack speed by 5% for 3s, stacking up to 3 times.
Gain 5% bonus movement speed out of combat.
Your heals and shields are 15% more effective.
Gain physical power based on your maximum mana.
Basic attacks deal physical damage in a small area around the target.
Deal 15 magical damage per second to nearby enemies.
Gain 4 physical penetration.
Every third conescutive basic attack deals bonus physical damage based on your bonus health and slows the target by 10% for 1s.
Dealing physical damage reduces the target's healing by 40% for 3s.
Dealing magical damage reduces the target's healing by 40% for 3s.
Basic attacks deal 12 bonus physical damage on-hit.
Receiving physical damage reduces the target's healing by 40% for 3s.
Casting an ability grants 3 magical power and physical armor for 5s, stacking up to 5 times.
Cleanse all Negative Debuffs from yourself - 90s CD.
After using an ability, your next 2 basic attacks within 6s deal bonus magical damage based on your magical power - 3s CD.
Basic attacking an Enemy Hero grants 3% movement speed for 3s.
If you take significant magical damage in the last 5s, gain 10% movement speed and 30 magical armor for 5s - 90s CD.
Basic attacks against Enemy Heroes deal 1.5% of their maximum health as physical damage on-hit.
Gain 20% tenacity.
Dealing magical damage to an Enemy Hero increases magical damage dealt by 3% for 5s, stacking up to 4 times.
Gain 15% physical penetration.
Gain 8 magical penetration.
Gain 15% magical penetration.
If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, cleanse all CC debuffs from yourself - 90s CD.
Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero reduces their physical armor by 5% for 2s, stacking up to 6 times.
Gain 2 magical power when damaging Enemy Heroes with an ability, stacking up to 15 times (3s CD). At maximum stacks, gain an additional 20 magical power. Lose all stacks on death.
When you damage an Enemy target with an ability or basic attack, restore maximum mana over 3s, stacking up to 4 times. At maximum stacks, gain ability haste.
Gain 8 physical penetration.
Place an Oracle Ward that lasts for 3 minutes.
Stores 4 Oracle Wards that are invisible and additionally reveal invisible Enemy Targets within their vision. Refills at base. Oracle Wards count towards normal Ward Cap.
Healing or shielding an Allied Hero will additionally heal them over 5s. Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero reduces the cooldown by 5s per instance - 40s CD.
Your heals and shields are 15% more effective.
Yourself and nearby Allied Heroes gain attack speed and deal magical damage.
When another Hero dies, gain a stack of Vitality up to a maximum of 10 stacks, each stack grants 0.4 health regeneration and 0.1 mana regeneration. Dying causes you to lose all stacks.
Grants nearby allies 1% omnivamp and 1% increased physical power and magical power per stack of Vitality.
Healing or shielding Allied Heroes grants you and them 30 magical power and 20 ability haste for 5s.
Your heals and shields are 15% more effective.

Immobilizing an Enemy deals bonus magical damage based on your bonus health to the target and nearby enemies, increased by 150% against Jungle Minions. Damaged targets have their magical armor shredded by 35% for 4s - 6s CD.
Deal magical damage per second to nearby enemies, increased by 50% against immobilized targets and 100% against Jungle Minions.
Deal magic damage based on your physical power per second to nearby enemies, increased by 100% against targets below 30% maximum health and 50% against Jungle Minions.
Killing a Minion grants 6 bonus health per stack, up to a maximum of 300 bonus health. At maximum stacks, gain 10 ability haste.
Gain (+1% Maximum Health) ability haste.
Allied Heroes within 700 units receive 20% increased healing and shielding.
Enemy Heroes within 700 units have their healing reduced by 60%.
When you cast an ability, reduce all other current basic ability cooldowns by 15%.
Casting an ability grants 5 magical power and physical armor for 5s stacking up to 5 times.
Basic attacks Slow the target by 3% for 2s, stacking up to 8 times. At max stacks, Root the target for 1.25s. The Root has an 8s cooldown per target.
Expend all stacks of Penance to heal nearby Allied Heroes for 20% of Penance - 15s CD.
Healing or shielding an ally grants charges of Penance equal to the value shielded/healed. Stacks cap at 1000.
Your heals and shields are 15% more effective.
If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% maximum health, you unleash a shockwave that stuns all nearby enemies for 1s - 90s CD.
Reduce physical damage taken by 8 (+8% Physical Armor).
When you cast your ultimate ability, gain a Spell Shield for 6s - 45s CD.
Gain 35% Tenacity.
Every third consecutive basic attack deals bonus physical damage based on your maximum health and Slows them by 20% for 1s.
Dealing damage with Sunder grants attack speed for 4s, stacking up to 6 times.
Deal 30% bonus damage to shielded targets as physical damage on-hit and slow the target by 20% for 1s.
Damaging abilities slow affected units by 20% for 1s.
Dealing magic damage to an Enemy Hero increases magical damage dealt by 3% for 5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Moving generates stacks of ZeroG, at 100 stacks your next jump will have increased height.
Gain 10% movement speed out of combat.
Restore mana equal to 10% of damage taken from Heroes.
Gain 20 ability haste when above 60% maximum mana.
Basic attacking an Enemy Hero grants the ability to travel through units and 1% movement speed for 3s stacking up to 5 times.
Reaching max stacks of Dancer grants a large shield for 4s - 30s CD.
Basic attacks deal 20 bonus true damage on-hit.
Basic attacks deal physical damage based on your bonus health.
Basic attacks deal physical damage in a small area around the target.
Gain 40% physical penetration.
Nearby Enemy Heroes take 15% additional magical damage.
Gain 35% Tenacity.
When struck by a basic attack on-hit, reduce the attacker's healing by 60% and apply a bleed that deals magical damage based on your physical armor over 3s, increased by 150% to Jungle minions.
Dealing physical damage reduces the target's healing by 60% for 3s.
Grants a Spell Shield that blocks the next Enemy ability - 80s CD.
Every third consecutive basic attack or ability deals bonus physical damage, Slows them by 20% for 1s and reduces the cooldown of Spell Shield by 5s.
Dealing magical damage reduces the target's healing by 60% for 3s.
If you are hit by a displacement, you restore (+16% Maximum Health) health over 8s.
Gain 35% Tenacity.
Reveal nearby stealthed Heroes and Wards and gain 15% decaying movement speed for 10s - 90s CD.
Killing an Enemy Minion grants 8 bonus mana per stack, up to a maximum of 400 bonus mana. At maximum stacks, gain 20 ability haste.
When you damage an Enemy target with an ability or basic attack, restore maximum mana over 3s, stacking up to 4 times. At maximum stacks, gain ability haste.
Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero reduces their physical armor by 5% for 2s. Stacks up to 6 times.
Every third consecutive basic attack deals bonus physical damage and slows them by 20% for 1s.
Hero takedowns grant you 30 attack speed and regenerate 6% of your missing health per second for 8s.
Slow nearby enemies by 10% and apply a stack of Stifle every 0.5s.
When hit by a basic attack, reduce the source's attack speed by 5% for 3s, stacking up to 5 times.
After using an ability, your next 2 basic attacks within 6s deal bonus physical damage based on your maximum health and slows the target by 10% for 1s, stacking up to 2 times - 3s CD.
Receiving physical damage reduces the target's healing by 60% for 3s.
If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% maximum health, you unleash a shockwave that stuns all nearby enemies for 1s - 90s CD.
Successful critical strikes increase your physical armor for 3s, stacking up to 5 times.
If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, cleanse all Negative Debuffs and gain 20% lifesteal for 8s - 90s CD.
Gain 1 physical power for every 2% missing health, for a maximum of 35 physical power.
Hitting an Enemy Hero with an ability restores health over 5s. Excess healing will be converted to a shield for 10s.
After using an ability, your next 2 basic attacks within 6s deal bonus magical damage based on your magical power - 3s CD.
If you take significant magical damage in the last 5s, gain 10% movement speed, 15% lifesteal and 40 magical armor for 5s. This duration is refreshed upon taking additional magical damage - 40s CD.
After using an ability, your next 2 basic attacks or abilities within 6s deal bonus physical damage - 3s CD.
Regenerate 15% of damage taken over 5s.
Increases all healing received by 20%
Cleanse all Negative Debuffs from yourself and gain 30% movement speed for 3s - 90s CD.
Grants a Spell Shield that blocks the next Enemy ability - 60s CD.
After using an ability, your next 2 basic attacks within 6s deal bonus physical damage based on your critical strike chance - 3s CD.
Basic attacks restore 1% maximum mana on-hit.
Enemy critical strikes deal 20% reduced damage.
When hit by a basic attack, reduce the source's attack speed by 5% for 3s, stacking up to 5 times. Max stacks are applied if the damage received is a critical strike.
Dealing magical damage to an Enemy Hero grants increased magical power for 6s stacking up to 3 times. At maximum stacks, gain 10% movement speed.
Displace all nearby enemies and deal magical damage to them - 30s CD.
Basic Attacks deal bonus physical damage (doubled for critical strikes) vs targets below 40% max health.
Takedowns heal you over 5s based on your physical power.
When you take magical damage, release a pulse of energy dealing magical damage to enemies within 800 units - 1.5s CD.
Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero reduces their physical armor by 5% for 2s. Stacks up to 6 times.
Your abilities deal 20% bonus true damage against targets with 6 stacks of Corrode.

Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero with an ability deals 4.5% of their maximum health as magical damage over 3s. Additional applications from separate abilities within the duration will deal additional magical damage instantly and refresh the duration.
Dealing damage to an isolated Enemyh Hero (no other Enemy Heroes within 600 units) grants additional attack speed and ability haste for 3s. Dusk stacks up to 3 times.
If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you gain a large shield (halved for Ranged Heroes) for 6s. - 60s CD
Successful basic attacks against Enemy Heroes heal you for 4% of your missing health.
Every fourth successful basic attack within 3s releases a bolt of lightning that leaps between 7 targets, dealing magical damage to each.
Dealing magical damage reduces the target's healing by 60^ for 3s.
When receiving magical damage, gain 5 magical armor and 2 health regeneration per each 40 magical damage dealt for 8s, stacking up to 8 times.
Every third successful basic attack deals bonus magical damage.
Basic Attacks against Enemy Heroes decrease current basic ability cooldowns by 0.25 seconds (doubled for critical stikes).
Abilities deal an additional 20% physical damage against Enemy Heroes below 40% maximum health.
Grants bonus magical power equal to (+4% Maximum Mana).
When you damage an Enemy target with an ability or basic attack, restore maximum mana over 3s, stacking up to 4 times. At maximum stacks, gain ability haste.
Gain 40% magical penetration.
Gain charges upon moving. At 100 charges, the next instance of magical damage you deal will expend all charges to deal bonus magical damage in a large radius.
When you damage an Enemy target with an ability or basic attack, restore maximum mana over 3s, stacking up to 4 times. At maximum stacks, gain ability haste.
Dealing damage to an enemy target deals an additional physical damage in a small area around them.
Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero reduces their physical armor by 5% for 2s. Stacks up to 6 times.
Critical strikes deal 10% more damage against targets with 6 stacks of Corrode.
Dealing physical damage reduces the target's healing by 60^ for 3s.
Killing an Enemy Minion grants 8 bonus mana per stack, up to a maximum of 400 bonus mana. At maximum stacks, gain 10 ability haste.
Basic attacks and physical damage abvilities deal bonus physical damage based on your maximum mana.
Gain (+1.5 Maximum Mana) physical power.
Critical strikes gain additional attack speed for 5 seconds, stacking up to 8 times. At maximum stacks you gain additional Physical Power and Movement Speed.
Basic attacks deal 15 (+20 Magical Power) bonus magic damage on-hit.
Gain (+75% Ability Haste) attack speed.
Basic attacks deal 15 (+20 Magical Power) bonus magic damage on-hit.
Gain (+75% Ability Haste) attack speed.
Basic attacks against Enemy Heroes deal 4% of their maximum health as physical damage on-hit.
Abilities deal additional magical damage based on how much more health the target has than you.
Gain 20% magical penetration plus an additional 1% per 100 bonus health.
Dealing magical damage to an Enemy Hero increases magic damage dealt by 3% for 5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Critical strikes deal 4% increased damage against Enemy Heroes per every 500 maximum health.
Gain 10% Critical Strike Damage.
Moving generates stacks of Insanity. At 100 stacks your next basic attack will consume them to deal bonus physical damage.
Increase flat physical penetration by 50%.
Increase your ability haste by (+20% Magical Power)%.
Increase your magical power by 40%.
Dealing damage to an Enemy Hero slows them by 20% and grants you 20% movement speed for 3s. This effect refreshes on takedowns - 60s CD.
Increase flat physical penetration by 50%.
After using an ability, your next 2 basic attacks within 6s deal bonus physical damage - 3s CD.
Basic attacks deal bonus true damage.
After using an ability, your next 2 basic attacks within 6s deal 4% of the target's maximum health as bonus physical damage - 3s CD.
Basic attacks against Enemy Heroes deal 2% of their maximum health as physical damage on-hit.
